from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment_Update").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("TGT")
 .merge(
    source_df.alias("SRS"),
    "TGT.visitarchiveid = SRS.visitarchiveid"
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition = """
        (COALESCE(TGT.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(SRS.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp, to_timestamp('1900-01-01'))) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(SRS.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')))
    """,
    set = {
        "Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp": "SRS.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp",
        "Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp": "SRS.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values = {
        "visitarchiveid": "SRS.visitarchiveid",
        "Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp": "SRS.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp",
        "Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp": "SRS.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment_Update").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the update
updated_df = target_df.join(source_df, "visitarchiveid", "full_outer")

updated_df = updated_df.select(
    coalesce(target_df.visitarchiveid, source_df.visitarchiveid).alias("visitarchiveid"),
    when(source_df.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp.isNotNull(), source_df.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp)
    .otherwise(target_df.Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp).alias("Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp"),
    when(source_df.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp.isNotNull(), source_df.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp)
    .otherwise(target_df.Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp).alias("Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp")
)

# Remove rows that are not in the source
updated_df = updated_df.join(source_df, "visitarchiveid", "left_semi")

# Write the updated DataFrame back to the Delta table
updated_df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = updated_df.count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after update: {affected_rows}")
